metadata.description: A unique name for this deployment.
User name to login to the Web Application Firewall.
Password to login to the Web Application Firewall.
Unique DNS Name for the Public IP used to access the Web Application Firewalls for management.
The protocol(s) that will be used to configure the WAF VIPs.
The public IP address or DNS FQDN of the application that this WAF will protect.
If deploying an HTTP application, the port on which your service listens for unencrypted traffic. This field is not required when deploying https only.
Is your application running on a Linux OS or a Windows OS?

Please select how aggressive you would like the blocking level of this WAF to be.  Remember that the more aggressive the blocking level, the more potential there is for false-positives that the WAF might detect. Select Custom to specify your own security policy below.
Specify the publicly available URL of a custom ASM security policy in XML format. This policy will be applied in place of the standard High/Medium/Low policy as indicated above.

variables.commandArgs: [concat('-m ', parameters('applicationProtocols'), ' -d ', parameters('deploymentName'), ' -n ', parameters('applicationAddress'), ' -h ', parameters('applicationPort'), ' -t ', toLower(parameters('applicationType')), ' -l ', toLower(parameters('blockingLevel')), ' -a ', parameters('customPolicy'), ' -u ', parameters('adminUsername'), ' -p ', parameters('adminPassword'))]

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('f5-rest-node ./runScripts.js --log-level debug --tag ', variables('f5CloudLibsTag'), ' --onboard " --output /var/log/onboard.log --log-level debug --host ', concat(variables('ipAddress'), 4), ' -u admin -p ', parameters('adminPassword'), ' --hostname ', concat(variables('wafNamePrefix'), 0, '.azuresecurity.com'), ' --set-password admin:', parameters('adminPassword'), ' --license ', parameters('licenseKey1'), ' --db provision.1nicautoconfig:disable --db tmm.maxremoteloglength:2048 --module ltm:nominal --module asm:nominal --module afm:none --update-sigs --tz UTC --signal ONBOARD_DONE " --script " --wait-for ONBOARD_DONE --output /var/log/runScript.log --log-level debug --url http://cdn-prod-ore-f5.s3-website-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/product/blackbox/staging/azure/deploy_waf_rc.sh --cl-args ', variables('singleQuote'), variables('commandArgs'), ' -w ', reference(concat('Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/', variables('workspaceName')), '2015-11-01-preview').customerId, ' -k ', listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/', variables('workspaceName')), '2015-11-01-preview').primarySharedKey, variables('singleQuote'), '"')]
